relation.text: permits me to do so much for my Health -- as for Evenings
add to them a charm . I have been much better within these ten Days
had almost cured my cough , it is now
heard from my Brother from thence on Friday
do not expect it till the end of May
4 Days distance from them after having been at that of 19 -- is quite delight ful & prepares
think with pleasure of a Ball next Thursday
was interrupted in three days ago
will perceive by the date -- this is Tuesday
Remember me kindly to Mr D . & Ly . Wake -- you now
